subject: What IS 0EM Software And Why D0 You Care?
body:
OEM is Original Equipment Manufacturer. So OEM is lowest price.
OEM software is no CD/DVD, no packing case and no booklets!
You will pay for software ONLY and save 75-90%!

Discounts! Special offers! For home and office!
